\Aura\WebSignal

A basic signal manager for executing controller hooks.

Methods

handler()

handler(object $origin, string $signal, callable $callback) : void

Adds a handler to the list.

Parameters

object $origin

The object sending the signal.
string $signal

The signal being sent.
callable $callback

The callback to execute when the signal is sent.
